attributes.long-description:
Why does your heart beat faster when you peer into a dark room? What makes your skin goose bump when you see an odd shape in the shadows? Why do you hold your breath when you hear a strange noise? Fear.
Fear keeps you alive. Imagine being in a remote hotel on a stormy night. A serial killer is on the loose, and with each flash of lighting and clap of thunder, his knife could be at your throat. Or picture being stranded on an island shrouded in fog and crawling with zombies.

But how many heart-stopping jolts can you take? Test your endurance by playing the Thriller Chiller Bundle, a pack of two adventures designed to rattle your nerves. In Mountain Crime: Requital stop a mad killer from slicing his way through the guest list. Then stay one step ahead of bloodthirsty creatures as you search a deserted island for your spouse in Twisted Lands: Shadow Town. In both games, you'll collect useful objects, solve mind-bending puzzles, and make one horrific discovery after another!

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

attributes.name: Thriller Chiller Bundle
